T02D1276:103a-1: dvi bhu dza he badzra s'a dha nam /
T02D1276:103a-3: dgyes pa rdo rje phyag gnyis pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D1276:103a-4: dpal rdo rje he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1276:103a-5: ae wam yi ge la bzhugs pas //
T02D1276:103a-6: dga' bzhi la sogs mnga' bdag ni //
T02D1276:103a-7: dang po dbus mtha' las grol ba //
T02D1276:103a-9: bla ma rnams dang sangs rgyas dang //
T02D1276:103a-10: chos dang dge 'dun gus bcas shing //
T02D1276:103a-11: rgan gzhon rdor spyod phyag byas nas //
T02D1276:103a-12: dgyes pa rdo rje'i sgrubs thabs bshad //
T02D1276:103a-13: dang po goms par byed pa ni //
T02D1276:103a-14: gang du sngags pas dngos grub 'grub cing /
T02D1276:103a-20: skye bos dben pa'i grong mtha' 'am /
T02D1276:103a-21: dgon par bsngags pa gsungs pa'i gnas bzang po brtag go //
T02D1276:103a-22: rang gi snying gar ram bsams la /
T02D1276:103a-23: de las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de la h'um yang bskyed la /
T02D1276:103a-24: dom bi n'is rjes su chags pas phrag na 'khyud
T02D1276:103a-25: pa'i thabs dang shes rab kyi bdag nyid can rdo
T02D1276:103a-27: thugs rje dang ldan pa'i rje btsun la /
T02D1276:103a-28: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i lha mo brgyad goo r'i ri dgas kyi mtshan ma bsnams pa /
T02D1276:103a-29: tsoo r'i nyi ma'i snod bsnams pa /
T02D1276:103a-30: be t'a l'i chu bsnams pa /
T02D1276:103a-32: pukka s'i phyag na rdo rje bsnams pa /
T02D1276:103a-33: sha ba r'i ro bsnams pa /
T02D1276:103a-34: tsandal'i da ma ru bsnams nas /
T02D1276:103a-35: g-yung mo de kho nas mchod pas de rnams kyis
T02D1276:103a-36: gco bo la mchod pa byed pa nam mkha' la
T02D1276:103a-38: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
T02D1276:103a-39: sdig pa thams cad bshags par ba gyi [?] //
T02D1276:103a-40: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang //
T02D1276:103a-41: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
T02D1276:103a-42: dang po byams pa bsgom par bya //
T02D1276:103a-43: gnyis pa snying rje bsgom par bya //
T02D1276:103a-44: gsum pa dga' ba bsgoms nas ni //
T02D1276:103a-45: kun gyi mtha' ru btang snyoms so //
T02D1276:103b-0: yang sems stong pa nyid du dmigs @103b pas tha mal pa'i nga rgyal spang bar bya ste /
T02D1276:103b-1: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1276:103b-2: dang por ram las nyi ma bsam //
T02D1276:103b-3: nyi ma'i dbus su rab gnas pa'i //
T02D1276:103b-4: h'um las sna tshogs rdo rjer bsam //
T02D1276:103b-5: rdo rje de las ra ba dang //
T02D1276:103b-6: rdo rje'i gur gyis phub par bsgom //
T02D1276:103b-7: mkha' dbyings bha ga bsgoms nas ni //
T02D1276:103b-8: de nang bsgom par bya ba ni //
T02D1276:103b-9: dang por ro ni bsam bya ste //
T02D1276:103b-10: chos dbyings bdag med yin zhes bya //
T02D1276:103b-11: de stengs gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1276:103b-12: he ru ka ru bsgom par bya //
T02D1276:103b-13: a'a li las zla k'a li nyi //
T02D1276:103b-14: de stengs sa bon h'um brtag bya //
T02D1276:103b-15: h'um las rdo rje bsam par bya //
T02D1276:103b-16: rdo rje'i lte ba h'um la yang //
T02D1276:103b-17: de nyid h'um ni gnas par bsam //
T02D1276:103b-18: me long ye shes zla ba ste //
T02D1276:103b-19: mnyam nyid ye shes bdun par ldan //
T02D1276:103b-20: phyag mtshan sa bon so sor rtog / thams cad gcig bsdus bya nan tan //
T02D1276:103b-21: chos nyid dag pa'i rdzogs pa'i sku //
T02D1276:103b-22: mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga //
T02D1276:103b-23: rim bzhin mkhas pas bsgom par gsungs //
T02D1276:103b-24: sems can lus las yang dag 'byung //
T02D1276:103b-25: dkyil 'khor gtso bo bsgom par bya //
T02D1276:103b-26: zhal dang phyag mtshan gsungs bzhin te //
T02D1276:103b-27: chu shel lta bu'i 'od mnga' ba //
T02D1276:103b-28: dga' bas gnyis ni snyoms par zhugs //
T02D1276:103b-29: bdag med ma dang lhan cig sbyor //
T02D1276:103b-30: bsrub bya bsrubs pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1276:103b-31: goo r'i la sogs nges 'byung bya //
T02D1276:103b-32: gam tsam bam gham pam sam lam dam sa bon las nges 'byung //
T02D1276:103b-33: dbang po goo r'i gshin rje sku //
T02D1276:103b-34: chu yi phyogs su be t'a l'i //
T02D1276:103b-35: lus ngan phyogs su ghasma r'i //
T02D1276:103b-37: me yi phyogs su sha pa r'i //
T02D1276:103b-39: rlung gi phyogs su do mbir 'dod //
T02D1276:103b-40: goo r'i kha dog nag por 'gyur //
T02D1276:103b-41: tsoo r'i btsod kyi kha dog ldan //
T02D1276:103b-42: be t'a l'i ni gtso mo'i mdog / margata ma dog 'dra ghasma r'i //
T02D1276:103b-44: sha ba r'i ni chu shel bzhin //
T02D1276:103b-46: do mbi n'i ni sna tshogs mdog / ro yi steng na 'od 'bar zhing //
T02D1276:103b-47: phyag gnyis dbu skra gyen du brdzes //
T02D1276:103b-48: sbyin dmar zhal ni gcig dang bcas //
T02D1276:103b-49: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1276:103b-50: phyag ni gcig na ka p'a la bsnams //
T02D1276:104a-0: @104a * // g-yas kyi phyag na gri gug go //
T02D1276:104a-1: kha tv'am ga ni phyag g-yon na //
T02D1276:104a-2: rked pa stag gi pags pas g-yogs //
T02D1276:104a-3: de nas rdo rje chags chen gyis //
T02D1276:104a-4: rig ma dang bcas zhu bar gyur //
T02D1276:104a-5: sna tshogs glu dang nyer spyod pas //
T02D1276:104a-6: de nas lha mo skul bar byed //
T02D1276:104a-7: snying rje'i yid kyis lha mo bzhengs //
T02D1276:104a-8: sbos mos bdag la yongs su skyobs //
T02D1276:104a-9: stong pa'i ting 'dzin spangs nas ni //
T02D1276:104a-10: bde chen 'dod pas bdag la sbyor //
T02D1276:104a-11: khyod mi bzhugs na bdag 'gum pas //
T02D1276:104a-12: stong pa'i rang bzhin spangs nas su //
T02D1276:104a-13: ri khrod ma 'bras bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02D1276:104a-14: dgyes pa rdo rje khyod bzhengs shig /'dod pas 'jig rten snying mnan na //
T02D1276:104a-15: gtso bo ci phyir stong nyid bzhugs //
T02D1276:104a-16: khyod mi bzhugs na phyogs rmongs pas //
T02D1276:104a-17: gtum mo bdag ni gsol ba 'debs //
T02D1276:104a-18: bdag gis khyod kyi thugs 'tshal gyis //
T02D1276:104a-19: sgyu 'phrul lta bur khyod bzhengs shig /
T02D1276:104a-20: 'gro gtso smra bas bdag legs shes //
T02D1276:104a-21: thugs rje rgyun chad ma mdzad cig / dang po stong nyid byang chub ste //
T02D1276:104a-22: gnyis pa sa bon bsdus pa yin //
T02D1276:104a-23: gsum pa gzugs ni rdzogs pa ste //
T02D1276:104a-24: bzhi pas sa bon dgod pa po //
T02D1276:104a-25: h'um rdo rje las rdo rje cher //
T02D1276:104a-26: zhu ba'i gzugs ni bzhengs par gyur //
T02D1276:104a-28: rang gi lus ni rnam spros pas //
T02D1276:104a-29: nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor khyab byas nas //
T02D1276:104a-30: tshogs re slar yang 'dus pa yin //
T02D1276:104a-31: rnal 'byor zhe sdang bdag nyid gyur //
T02D1276:104a-32: kha dog sngo zhing cung zad dmar //
T02D1276:104a-33: dbu skra ser po gyen du brjes //
T02D1276:104a-34: phyag rgya lnga yi rgyan gyis brgyan //
T02D1276:104a-35: 'khor lo rna cha mgul rgyan dang //
T02D1276:104a-36: lag pa'i gdu bu ska rags rnams //
T02D1276:104a-37: sangs rgyas lnga yi rnam dag ste //
T02D1276:104a-38: phyag rgya lnga ru rab tu grags //
T02D1276:104a-39: bcu drug cha byad khros pas gzigs //
T02D1276:104a-40: phyag g-yon rdo rje thod pas mtshan //
T02D1276:104a-41: kha tv'am ga yang g-yon pa ni //
T02D1276:104a-42: rdo rje 'bar ba g-yas pa na //
T02D1276:104a-43: h'um sgrogs pa yi bdag nyid can //
T02D1276:104a-44: lha mo brgyad kyis yongs bskor nas //
T02D1276:104a-45: mgon po dur khrod nang na rol //
T02D1276:104a-46: dpal ni gnyis med ye shes te //
T02D1276:104a-47: he ni rgyu sogs stong pa nyid //
T02D1276:104a-48: ru ni bkod pa spangs pa yin //
T02D1276:104b-0: ka ni gang du mi gnas @104b pa //
T02D1276:104b-1: chos kyi dbyings las nges 'khrungs pas //
T02D1276:104b-2: chos nyid bdag nyid bsgom pa yin //
T02D1276:104b-3: aom dha rma dh'a tu sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham //
T02D1276:104b-4: mig ni rdo rje gti mug ma //
T02D1276:104b-5: rna ba rdo rje zhe sdang ma //
T02D1276:104b-6: sna ni ser sna rdo rje ma //
T02D1276:104b-7: lce ni 'dod chags rdo rje ma //
T02D1276:104b-8: reg bya rdo rje phrag dog ma'o //
T02D1276:104b-9: bdag med rnal 'byor ma ni yid //
T02D1276:104b-10: sa spyod ma ni lus rdo rje //
T02D1276:104b-11: mkha' spyod ma ni gsung rdo rje //
T02D1276:104b-12: thugs ni dbus na bzhugs pa'i phyir //
T02D1276:104b-13: de phyir bdag med ma dbus 'khrungs //
T02D1276:104b-14: rang snying nas ni sa bon byung //
T02D1276:104b-15: 'od zer nag po dang ldan la //
T02D1276:104b-16: lcags kyu'i rnam pa can gyis ni //
T02D1276:104b-17: khams gsum na bzhugs sangs rgyas rnams //
T02D1276:104b-18: yum brgyad dang bcas bkug nas ni //
T02D1276:104b-19: yang dag mchod nas gsol ba gdab //
T02D1276:104b-20: aom aa bhi shinytsa tu mam sarba ta th'a ga ta zhes bya bas so //
T02D1276:104b-21: he ru ka sku'i cha byad can //
T02D1276:104b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams kyis //
T02D1276:104b-23: de bzhin gshegs lnga bdag nyid can //
T02D1276:104b-24: bdud rtsi lnga yis gang ba yi //
T02D1276:104b-26: rnga brdungs pa'i sgra dang ldan pas me tog gi char dang gur gum gyi char 'bebs shing //
T02D1276:104b-27: thugs rje la sogs pa mngon par bstod cing /
T02D1276:104b-28: spyan la sogs pas glu len pas dbang bskur bas
T02D1276:104b-29: mgo la rang gi rigs kyi bdag po bzhugs par
T02D1276:104b-30: 'gyur ro // 'khor lo'i gzugs ni mi bskyod pa //
T02D1276:104b-31: rna ba 'od dpag med kyi bdag / mgul rgyan
T02D1276:104b-32: rin chen 'byung ba'i bdag / gdu bu rnam par
T02D1276:104b-33: snang mdzad 'dod // ska rags la ni don grub bzhugs //
T02D1276:104b-34: shes rab rang bzhin kha tv'am ga /'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa yi //
T02D1276:104b-35: rnam rtog bcad pa padma'i snod //
T02D1276:104b-36: rnam par grol ba'i rgyu ru ni //
T02D1276:104b-37: bdud bzhi'i khrag ni gsol ba yin //
T02D1276:104b-38: snying rje'i spyan ni dmar ba yin //
T02D1276:104b-39: yan lag nag po byams pa'i sems //
T02D1276:104b-40: pags pa byang chub yan lag bdun //
T02D1276:104b-41: rus pa'i rgyan ni bden pa bzhi //
T02D1276:104b-42: khro ba ma rungs gdul bya la //
T02D1276:104b-43: khrag ni sha ba r'i ru bstan //
T02D1276:104b-45: tshil dang rkang ni do mbi n'i //
T02D1276:104b-46: bdud la sogs pa nyes pa drug / gcod phyir gri gug thogs pas bzhugs //
T02D1276:104b-47: thod pa stong nyid ngo bo ste /
T02D1276:105a-0: @105a * // thams cad thabs su shes par bya //
T02D1276:105a-1: dus tshigs gsum ldan byin gyis brlabs //
T02D1276:105a-2: lha yi sku ru gnas par bya //
T02D1276:105a-3: bya rnams byed tshe rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1276:105a-5: skad cig tsam yang sems gzhan ni //
T02D1276:105a-6: ma rig ma rungs ldan sems kyis //
T02D1276:105a-7: dngos grub 'dod pa'i sgrub pa pos //
T02D1276:105a-8: 'bad pas mkhas pas gnas mi bya //
T02D1276:105a-9: zla drug rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na //
T02D1276:105a-10: the tshom 'dir med dngos grub thob //
T02D1276:105a-11: de la so ma nyi mi bya ste //
T02D1276:105a-12: sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab //
T02D1276:105a-13: yan lag ji snyed yod pa dang //
T02D1276:105a-14: gong du brjod pa thams cad ni //
T02D1276:105a-15: de snyed sngags dang phyag rgya yin //
T02D1276:105a-16: dpal ldan he ru'i go 'phang gnas //
T02D1276:105a-17: de la sngags ni 'di yin te //
T02D1276:105a-18: aom tree lo ky'a kshe pa h'um h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1276:105a-19: gshegs su gsol ba'i don du spyan drangs nas //
T02D1276:105a-21: bsod nams yongs su bsngos la bzod par gsol lo //
T02D1276:105a-22: he ru ka rnam par bsams nas ldang ba'i bla ma'i man ngag yin no //
T02D1276:105a-23: shes rab bla ma'i zho rtag tu //
T02D1276:105a-24: bla ma dam pa'i gdams ngag gi / bdud rtsi myang ba gang yin pa //
T02D1276:105a-25: de yis sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur //
T02D1276:105a-26: dgyes rdor rgyud las gsungs pa yi //
T02D1276:105a-27: der rnyed rim pas bsdus nas ni //
T02D1276:105a-28: dgyes pa'i sgrub thabs gsal byas pas //
T02D1276:105a-29: bsod nams dpag med gang bsags pa //
T02D1276:105a-30: des ni ltas ngan nyes mang zhing //
T02D1276:105a-31: sdug bsngal gyis rmongs bsam ldan 'gro //
T02D1276:105a-32: ma lus thub dbang dkyil 'khor che //
T02D1276:105a-33: dpal ldan rgyal po'i snod thob shog / gsung bsdus pa'i dgyes pa rdo rje'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02D1276:105a-35: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ma ti shr'i bha dra dang /
